info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 5:58PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORM OUTFLOW WINDS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHERN ROOSEVELT AND SOUTHERN CURRY COUNTIES THROUGH 630 PM MDT... At 557 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong outflow winds along a line extending from 11 miles south of Grady to near Saint Vrain to 8 miles west of Melrose. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clovis, Farwell, Texico, Melrose, Saint Vrain, Cannon Air Force Base, Ranchvale, Oasis State Park, Floyd and Portair. This includes Highway 60 between Mile Markers 351 and 397. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building.
